vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Θαρά (Rec. Θάρα), ὁ, indecl. (Heb. תֶּרַח),
Terah (Gen.11:24-28, 31-32): Luk.3:34.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.24;
son of: Nahor (H5152);
father of: Abraham (H0085), Nahor (H5152H), Haran (H2039) and Sarah (H8283)
§ Terah, Abraham's father, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:34*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
他拉 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "繹站"
亞伯拉罕的父親 (路 3:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
他拉 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "绎站"
亚伯拉罕的父亲 (路 3:34)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Tha-rê: cha của Áp-ra-ham. Xem H8646. (Hapax)
